about_the_game:
Expand your gaming experience with this new expansion for Farming Simulator 19, created by the winners of the Farming Simulator Mod Contest Special Award!

The DLC contains 13 new tools from GRIMME and one additional Lizard tool:

  • GRIMME GH 2 - Weeder
  • GRIMME GH 4 - Weeder
  • GRIMME GH 8 - Weeder
  • GRIMME GL 32 E - Potato Planter
  • GRIMME GL 32 F - Potato Planter
  • GRIMME WH 200 Eco - Potato Harvester
  • GRIMME WH 200 S - Potato Harvester
  • GRIMME WR 200 CDW - Potato Harvester
  • GRIMME SE 85-55 - Potato Harvester
  • GRIMME GBF- Transport Belt
  • GRIMME PS 511 - Transport Belt
  • GRIMME MultiTrailer 190 - Trailer
  • GRIMME MultiTrailer 350 - Trailer
  • Lizard Conveyor Belt - Receiving Hopper

Once downloaded, the additional content will be available through the in-game shop. Be sure to have sufficient in-game currency to buy them!
This DLC is included in the Season Pass.
detailed_description:
Expand your gaming experience with this new expansion for Farming Simulator 19, created by the winners of the Farming Simulator Mod Contest Special Award!

The DLC contains 13 new tools from GRIMME and one additional Lizard tool:

  • GRIMME GH 2 - Weeder
  • GRIMME GH 4 - Weeder
  • GRIMME GH 8 - Weeder
  • GRIMME GL 32 E - Potato Planter
  • GRIMME GL 32 F - Potato Planter
  • GRIMME WH 200 Eco - Potato Harvester
  • GRIMME WH 200 S - Potato Harvester
  • GRIMME WR 200 CDW - Potato Harvester
  • GRIMME SE 85-55 - Potato Harvester
  • GRIMME GBF- Transport Belt
  • GRIMME PS 511 - Transport Belt
  • GRIMME MultiTrailer 190 - Trailer
  • GRIMME MultiTrailer 350 - Trailer
  • Lizard Conveyor Belt - Receiving Hopper

Once downloaded, the additional content will be available through the in-game shop. Be sure to have sufficient in-game currency to buy them!
This DLC is included in the Season Pass.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T @ 2.5GHz or AMD FX-4100 @3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650, AMD Radeon HD 7770 graphics card or better (min. 2 GB VRAM, DX11 support)
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE ONLINE GAME

movies.name: Farming Simulator 19 - GRIMME Equipment Pack Launch Trailer

name: Farming Simulator 19 - GRIMME Equipment Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Farming Simulator 19 - GRIMME Equipment Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T @ 2.5GHz or AMD FX-4100 @3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650, AMD Radeon HD 7770 graphics card or better (min. 2 GB VRAM, DX11 support)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE ONLINE GAME
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Expand your gaming experience with this new expansion for Farming Simulator 19, created by the winners of the Farming Simulator Mod Contest Special Award! The DLC contains 13 new tools from GRIMME and 1 Lizard bonus tool.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
